title: Arduino Workshop
description: The introduction session started with Mr.Bhushan Kolhe describing the Arduinoand software related to Arduino. He explained the procedure of using the Software in order to plot the code on Arduino IDE. He explained the students regarding different types of Arduino that are available in the market and also explained the functionality ofthe Arduino board. After introducing the students to Arduino and its related softwares,he briefed about few applications of microcontroller.
